title: This thread is round.
body:
https://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/64741294.jpg
If something is 100% round, then it has no point on the object making it pointless.

replies.body: It actually has an infinite amount of points around the circumference.
So the post is a broken pencil
Since this thread has no purpose, can I use it as a meme landfill?

Then where am I supposed to put this meme? 
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/009/289/RHrLj-1.jpg
